title: Gin-Gin Mule Recipe
full_text:
Gin-Gin Mule Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
10
mint
leaves
1/2
ounce
simple syrup
(or to taste)
1/2
ounce
lime juice
1 1/2
ounces
gin
2
ounces
chilled
ginger beer
Garnish:
lime wedge
and
mint sprig
Directions
In a cocktail shaker, lightly muddle mint leaves with simple syrup and lime juice.
Add gin and fill with ice; shake gently until chilled (you don't want to smash the mint to smithereens), about 10 seconds. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice, add ginger beer and stir. Garnish with lime wedge or mint sprig, or both.
Special equipment
Cocktail shaker, cocktail strainer
Gin
